pageTitle: Current SL Courses : About CUPS : Community-University Partnerships & Service Learning (CUPS) : University of Vermont
textBeforeTable: Fall 2015 To get a sense of courses which may be offered in the future, scroll down to see past offerings. Contact the professor or the department to learn more about courses. Each year about 80 service-learning courses are offered at UVM. They can be identified by the "SL" in the course title, and found in the online schedule of courses. These courses create meaningful partnerships between students, community partners, and faculty to provide students with hands-on learning in real-world situations. Current courses are updated regularly.
